column2: than  10  years  and  not  exceeding  20  years  and  with  a  fine  and  shall  also  be
to  pay  compensation  of an  amount  determined  by  Court  to

column1: person in  respect of whom the offence was committed.

column2: By  the amendment to the Penal Code by  Act No.  16  Of 2006, the mandatory
minimum  sentence  of imprisonment  was  amended  to  7 years  instead  of 10

column1: years. Certified date of the Act No.  16  of2006 is 24.04.2006.
